name: 20th Edition of the Global Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering, and Technology
content: Step into the forefront of catalysis, chemical engineering, and technology at the 20th Edition of the Global Conference on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering, and Technology! Taking place from March 27-29, 2025, in Singapore, and online, this hybrid event is your gateway to the latest advancements and innovations in the field. Themed "From Theory to Practice: Advancing Catalysis in the Modern Era," Chemical Engineering Conferences 2025 promises to explore the entire spectrum of catalysis and its applications. From fundamental theories to real-world applications, we'll delve into catalysis for renewable energy, environmental sustainability, chemical kinetics, and nanotechnology, among other topics. Prepare to engage in dynamic discussions, discover ground-breaking research, and connect with experts from around the globe. Whether you're a seasoned professional or an emerging researcher, Catalysis Conferences 2025 offers a diverse range of sessions, workshops, and networking opportunities tailored to your interests and expertise. Don't miss this opportunity to be part of the catalysis revolution! Join us at Green Catalysis Conferences 2025 and contribute to shaping the future of catalysis, chemical engineering, and technology.
